  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import yfinance as yf\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stderr",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "[*********************100%***********************]  1 of 1 completed\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "\n",
    "# List of stock tickers\n",
    "tickers = ['AAPL', 'MSFT', 'GOOG', 'AMZN', 'TSLA']\n",
    "\n",
    "# Download OHLCV data\n",
    "data = yf.download(\n",
    "    tickers=['AAPL', 'MSFT', 'GOOG', 'AMZN', 'TSLA'],\n",
    "    start='2020-01-01',\n",
    "    end='2025-01-01',\n",
    "    group_by='ticker',\n",
    "    interval='1d',  # Daily data\n",
    ")"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 25,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead tr th {\n",
       "        text-align: left;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead tr:last-of-type th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Ticker</th>\n",
       "      <th colspan=\"5\" halign=\"left\">AAPL</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Price</th>\n",

       "Price            Open       High        Low      Close     Volume\n",

   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 18,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "data.to_csv('stock_data.csv')\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 21,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "tickers = ['AAPL', 'MSFT', 'GOOG', 'AMZN', 'TSLA']\n",
    "start_date = '2020-01-01'\n",
    "end_date = '2021-01-01'"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 22,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stderr",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "[*********************100%***********************]  1 of 1 completed\n",
      "[*********************100%***********************]  1 of 1 completed\n",
      "[*********************100%***********************]  1 of 1 completed\n",
      "[*********************100%***********************]  1 of 1 completed\n",
      "[*********************100%***********************]  1 of 1 completed\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "\n",
    "all_data = pd.DataFrame()\n",
    "\n",
    "for ticker in tickers:\n",
    "    stock_data = yf.download(ticker, start=start_date, end=end_date, auto_adjust=False)\n",
    "\n",
    "    stock_data[\"Ticker\"] = ticker\n",
    "\n",
    "    all_data = pd.concat([all_data, stock_data])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 23,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
